name: VIRA
description:
Max Bludnev is the main character, who returns to his native land after a year of absence. He is finding out news about his Father, who got into trouble and Maxim will have to help him out and at the same time get to the truth of all his father's problems. 2015 year!

The good old 2D Quest on the principle of Point and Click. Jokes, Black Humor and simple controls are present!

- A short but interesting story about the adventures of Maxim.
- A system of saving on the principle of entering a Pin code!
- Real-life locations!

You must have Adobe Flash Player 11 or higher!
